ygData.subject: Bugs in implementation of Soret effect
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Finally I succeded in calculating 1-D flame with the Soret effect. To do this I fixed a few bugs in the Refine.cpp and StFlow.cpp files. I think that it

Hello,

Finally I succeded in calculating 1-D flame with the Soret effect. =
To 
do this I fixed a few bugs in the Refine.cpp and StFlow.cpp files. I 
t=
hink that it would be not very bad idea to fix these bugs in the 
Cantera d=
istribution as well. What's  a standard procedure for 
submitting and corre=
cting bugs in the Cantera?
